<ce:table colsep="0" frame="topbot" id="tbl2" rowsep="0" xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/cals/dtd">
<ce:label>Table 2</ce:label>
<ce:caption>
<ce:simple-para view="all">Unit cell dimensions of materials with structure type I, with different lanthanide cation contents, (La, Ce, Nd) with different ligands (<ce:bold>1</ce:bold>, <ce:bold>2</ce:bold>, <ce:bold>3</ce:bold>) and also in the dehydrated state, as measured by laboratory and synchrotron powder X-ray diffraction.</ce:simple-para>
</ce:caption>
<tgroup cols="8">
<colspec colname="col1" colnum="1"></colspec>
<colspec colname="col2" colnum="2"></colspec>
<colspec colname="col3" colnum="3"></colspec>
<colspec colname="col4" colnum="4"></colspec>
<colspec colname="col5" colnum="5"></colspec>
<colspec colname="col6" colnum="6"></colspec>
<colspec colname="col7" colnum="7"></colspec>
<colspec colname="col8" colnum="8"></colspec>
<thead>
<row rowsep="1" valign="top">
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd"></entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">K,La-I-<bold>1</bold>
</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">K,Ce-I-<bold>1</bold>
</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">K,Nd-I-<bold>1</bold>
</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">K,Ce-I-<bold>1</bold>
</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">K,Ce-I-<bold>2</bold>
</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">Na,Ce-I-<bold>3</bold>
</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">K,Ce-I-<bold>1</bold> (dehydrated)</entry>
</row>
</thead>
<tbody>
<row valign="top">
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">Diffractometer</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">Stoe</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">Stoe</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">Stoe</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">Synchrotron, ID-31</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">Synchrotron, ID-31</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">Synchrotron, I-11</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">Synchrotron, ID-31</entry>
</row>
<row valign="top">
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">
<italic>λ</italic> of X-rays (Å)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">1.54056</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">1.54056</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">1.54056</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">0.8002</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">0.8002</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">0.826019</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">0.8002</entry>
</row>
<row valign="top">
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">Temperature</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">RT</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">RT</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">RT</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">100<hsp sp="0.16"></hsp>K</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">100<hsp sp="0.16"></hsp>K</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">100<hsp sp="0.16"></hsp>K</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">100<hsp sp="0.16"></hsp>K</entry>
</row>
<row valign="top">
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">Crystal system</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">Monoclinic</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">Monoclinic</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">Monoclinic</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">Monoclinic</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">Monoclinic</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">Monoclinic</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">Monoclinic</entry>
</row>
<row valign="top">
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">Space group</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">
<italic>C</italic>2/<italic>c</italic>
</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">
<italic>C</italic>2/<italic>c</italic>
</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">
<italic>C</italic>2/<italic>c</italic>
</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">
<italic>C</italic>2/<italic>c</italic>
</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">
<italic>C</italic>2/<italic>c</italic>
</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">
<italic>C</italic>2/<italic>c</italic>
</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">
<italic>P</italic>2<inf loc="post">1</inf>/<italic>n</italic>
</entry>
</row>
<row valign="top">
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">
<italic>a</italic> (Å)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">22.439(13)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">22.560(16)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">22.445(16)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">22.5864(2)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">23.0899(10)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">22.9150(5)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">21.8361(12)</entry>
</row>
<row valign="top">
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">
<italic>b</italic> (Å)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">11.942(9)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">12.216(8)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">12.165(12)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">12.1186(2)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">13.9954(8)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">14.2802(3)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">9.3519(4)</entry>
</row>
<row valign="top">
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">
<italic>c</italic> (Å)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">5.739(3)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">5.648(5)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">5.588(5)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">5.6613(2)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">5.6406(5)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">5.6451(1)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">5.5629(3)</entry>
</row>
<row valign="top">
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">
<italic>α</italic> (°)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">90</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">90</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">90</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">90</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">90</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">90</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">90</entry>
</row>
<row valign="top">
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">
<italic>β</italic> (°)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">91.76(3)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">93.3(4)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">92.88(5)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">93.040(2)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">102.5546(10)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">102.8006(10)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">96.560(4)</entry>
</row>
<row valign="top">
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">
<italic>γ</italic> (°)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">90</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">90</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">90</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">90</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">90</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">90</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">90</entry>
</row>
<row valign="top">
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">
<italic>V</italic> (Å<sup loc="post">3</sup>)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">1537(2)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">1554(3)</entry>

<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">1128.56(11)</entry>
</row>
</tbody>
</tgroup>
<ce:legend>
<ce:simple-para view="all">Nomenclature as described in the text.</ce:simple-para>
</ce:legend>
</ce:table>
clean_text:
Table 2. Unit cell dimensions of materials with structure type I, with different lanthanide cation contents, (La, Ce, Nd) with different ligands (1, 2, 3) and also in the dehydrated state, as measured by laboratory and synchrotron powder X-ray diffraction.

|                    | K,La-I-1 | K,Ce-I-1 | K,Nd-I-1 | K,Ce-I-1 | K,Ce-I-2 | Na,Ce-I-3 | K,Ce-I-1 (dehydrated) |
|--------------------|----------|---------|---------|---------|---------|----------|-----------------------|
| Diffractometer     | Stoe     | Stoe    | Stoe    | Synchrotron, ID-31 | Synchrotron, ID-31 | Synchrotron, I-11 | Synchrotron, ID-31 |
| λ of X-rays (Å)     | 1.54056  | 1.54056 | 1.54056 | 0.8002  | 0.8002  | 0.826019 | 0.8002                |
| Temperature        | RT       | RT      | RT      | 100K    | 100K    | 100K     | 100K                  |
| Crystal system     | Monoclinic | Monoclinic | Monoclinic | Monoclinic | Monoclinic | Monoclinic | Monoclinic |
| Space group        | C2/c     | C2/c    | C2/c    | C2/c    | C2/c    | C2/c     | P21/n                 |
| a (Å)              | 22.439(13) | 22.560(16) | 22.445(16) | 22.5864(2) | 23.0899(10) | 22.9150(5) | 21.8361(12) |
| b (Å)              | 11.942(9) | 12.216(8) | 12.165(12) | 12.1186(2) | 13.9954(8) | 14.2802(3) | 9.3519(4) |
| c (Å)              | 5.739(3) | 5.648(5) | 5.588(5) | 5.6613(2) | 5.6406(5) | 5.6451(1) | 5.5629(3) |
| α (°)              | 90       | 90      | 90      | 90      | 90      | 90       | 90                   |
| β (°)              | 91.76(3) | 93.3(4) | 92.88(5) | 93.040(2) | 102.5546(10) | 102.8006(10) | 96.560(4) |
| γ (°)              | 90       | 90      | 90      | 90      | 90      | 90       | 90                   |
| V (Å³)             | 1537(2) | 1554(3) | 1524(4) | 1547.42(5) | 1780.06(7) | 1801.36(5) | 1128.56(11) |

Nomenclature as described in the text.
